title: Serv Sect in Iran and China

content.question: Which of the following is illustrated by the data in the table?

choices.label: Mexico and Nigeria have the highest literacy rates.
Russia and China have the largest agriculture-sector economies.
Iran and China have the smallest service-sector economies.
Russia and Mexico have the lowest literacy rates.

content.answer: Iran and China have the smallest service-sector economies.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
